title: Dots on apps on pixel 4a not visible. Tried turning them off,restarting,and turning ON. No Luck.
content: I verified that the dots were turned on in each app. Specifically email and text messaging app. Then I turned dots Off, restarted, and turned them back On. Nothing seems to allow me to see the dots on any apps.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
